attributes.action: make sure the motorways don't become super highways for the rich and well off by forcing poorer people (who cannot afford a new eco friendly car) off the road when they can't pay the increased road tax to be levied on older cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let the less well off wait on buses. What buses, I hear you ask? Time is money. Who has got time for public transport these days? Public transport ,to me and many others, means an extra 2 hours onto the working day, listening to someone elses choice of music and catching airborne viruses while being crushed against total strangers (some of whom might enjoy it!!) We want to keep our cars. We can't afford the extra tax. We can't afford a new car.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
